mapper.select: select * from notice_reply where notice_number = #{notice_number} order by reg_dt desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice_reply(notice_number, context, customer_id, reg_dt, edit_dt) values ( #{notice_number}, #{context}, #{customer_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update notice_reply set context=#{context}, edit_dt=now() where replyid=#{replyid}
